title: Launch
description: 10 001 Bored Pandas will be available for mint from everyone interested in our exciting project.

title: Build
description: We don't want to give fancy, but empty promises like most of the NFTs project out there, therefore we will keep it simple.

Our goal is to build and grow a community of people around their favorite action sport. Similar to what the large energy-drink/action-camera companies are doing, but we want to build it around the Blockchain/Web3 enthusiasts.
All those large corporations support professional and elite athletes, but there are very talented people who need help before they get recognized and sponsored.
Therefore, the aim of this project is to connect and help us establish a good collaboration with brands and influential people in our sector.

title: Growth
description: We would like to design and launch our own inspirational merchandise.
Bored Panda owners will have exclusive advantages!
Holders will also get exclusive rights to partner with brands for any kind of business, trade or collaboration.

title: Return
description: We want to bring value back to our NFT community.
Therefore we will create and launch exclusive Web3 Airdrops that will generate additional value to our community, completely for free to all Panda owners.
Stay tuned, it will be epic and also full of adrenaline!
